meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of lint.
meanings.sent1: The old sweater was linty from being washed with towels.
meanings.sent2: She picked up the linty socks from the laundry room floor.
meanings.sent3: The linty cat tried to groom itself but only made things worse.
meanings.sent4: The linty clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The linty blanket felt soft and cozy against her skin.

meanings.definition: Resembling lint in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The fabric was so linty that it almost looked fuzzy.
meanings.sent2: The linty material clung to her clothes after being in the dryer.
meanings.sent3: The linty flower petals made the bouquet look unique.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was linty after playing in the attic all afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The linty carpet felt rough under her bare feet.
